<array>
	<dict>
		<key>tile-data</key>
		<dict>
			<key>file-data</key>
			<dict>
				<key>_CFURLString</key>
				<string>MyApp.app</string>
				<key>_CFURLStringType</key>
				<integer>0</integer>
			</dict>
		</dict>
	</dict>
	<dict>
		<key>tile-data</key>
		<dict>
			<key>file-data</key>
			<dict>
				<key>_CFURLString</key>
				<string>Cool.app</string>

	</dict>

<array>
	<dict>
		<key>tile-data</key>
		<dict>
			<key>file-data</key>
			<dict>
				<key>_CFURLString</key>
				<string>file://~/Documents</string>
				<key>_CFURLStringType</key>
				<integer>15</integer>
			</dict>
		</dict>

		<string>directory-tile</string>
	</dict>

		<key>tile-data</key>
		<dict>
			<key>file-data</key>

				<integer>15</integer>
			</dict>
		</dict>

				<integer>15</integer>
			</dict>

		</dict>
